00032 TreeSceneController::TreeSceneController(wxTreeCtrl* treectrl)

00049 void TreeSceneController::createImageList(int size)
00050 {
00051         // Make an image list containing small icons
00052         wxImageList *images = new wxImageList(size, size, true);
00053 
00054         // should correspond to TreeCtrlIcon_xxx enum
00055         wxBusyCursor wait;
00056 
00057         // 5 icons
00058         wxIcon icons[5];
00059         icons[0] = wxIcon(icon_library_root_xpm);
00060         icons[1] = wxIcon(icon_library_scene_xpm);
00061         icons[2] = wxIcon(icon_library_trash_xpm);
00062         icons[3] = wxIcon(icon_library_assembly_xpm);
00063         icons[4] = wxIcon(icon_library_folder_xpm);
00064 
00065         int sizeOrig = icons[0].GetWidth();
00066 
00067         for (size_t i = 0; i < WXSIZEOF(icons); i++)
00068         {
00069                 if (size == sizeOrig)
00070                 {
00071                         images->Add(icons[i]);
00072                 }
00073                 else
00074                 {
00075                         images->Add(wxBitmap(wxBitmap(icons[i]).ConvertToImage().Rescale(size, size)));
00076                 }
00077         }
00078 
00079         // asign images
00080         m_treeCtrl->AssignImageList(images);
00081 }
00082 
00086 void TreeSceneController::createSceneTree()
00087 {
00088         Scene* scene = Scene::getInstance();
00089 
00090         // reset tree
00091         m_treeCtrl->DeleteAllItems();
00092 
00093         // create root-entry
00094         wxTreeItemId rootID = m_treeCtrl->AddRoot(wxT("Root"));
00095         m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(rootID, TreeCtrlIcon_Root);
00096 
00097         // create scene tree
00098         wxTreeItemId newID = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(rootID, wxT("Szene"));
00099         m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(newID, TreeCtrlIcon_Scene);
00100         createSceneTree(newID, scene->getRootAssembly());
00101 
00102         newID = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(rootID, wxT("Papierkorb"));
00103         m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(newID, TreeCtrlIcon_Trash);
00104         createSceneTree(newID, scene->getTrash());
00105 
00106         // expand root + scene
00107         m_treeCtrl->Expand(rootID);
00108         wxTreeItemIdValue cookie;
00109         m_treeCtrl->Expand(m_treeCtrl->GetFirstChild(rootID, cookie));
00110 
00111         // sort children of scene
00112         m_treeCtrl->SortChildren(m_treeCtrl->GetFirstChild(rootID, cookie));
00113 }
00114 
00120 void TreeSceneController::createSceneTree(wxTreeItemId id, Assembly* assembly)
00121 {
00122         if (assembly->getType() == IS_OBJECT || assembly->getType() == IS_PRIMITIVE)
00123         {
00124                 // generate ItemData for object and insert to tree
00125                 TreeSceneItemData* data = new TreeSceneItemData;
00126                 data->setAssembly(assembly);
00127                 wxTreeItemId newID = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(id, assembly->getName(), -1, -1, data);
00128                 m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(newID, TreeCtrlIcon_Assembly);
00129 
00130                 // make selected bold
00131                 if (assembly->getMaster()->getType() == IS_SELECTED)
00132                 {
00133                         m_treeCtrl->SetItemBold(newID);
00134                 }
00135                 // make hidden italic
00136                 if (assembly->isVisible() == false)
00137                 {
00138                         m_treeCtrl->SetItemFont(newID, *wxITALIC_FONT);
00139                 }
00140         }
00141         else if (assembly->getType() == IS_GROUP)
00142         {
00143                 // generate ItemData for group
00144                 TreeSceneItemData* data = new TreeSceneItemData;
00145                 data->setAssembly(assembly);
00146 
00147                 wxTreeItemId newID = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(id, assembly->getName(), -1, -1, data);
00148                 m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(newID, TreeCtrlIcon_Folder);
00149 
00150                 // make selected bold
00151                 if (assembly->getMaster()->getType() == IS_SELECTED)
00152                 {
00153                         m_treeCtrl->SetItemBold(newID);
00154                 }
00155                 // make hidden italic
00156                 if (assembly->isVisible() == false)
00157                 {
00158                         m_treeCtrl->SetItemFont(newID, *wxITALIC_FONT);
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 list<Assembly*> parts = assembly->getPartList();
00162                 for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = parts.begin(); it != parts.end(); ++it)
00163                 {
00164                         createSceneTree(newID, (*it));
00165                 }
00166         }
00167         else if (assembly->getType() == IS_ROOT || assembly->getType() == IS_TRASH || assembly->getType() == IS_SELECTED)
00168         {
00169                 list<Assembly*> parts = assembly->getPartList();
00170                 for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = parts.begin(); it != parts.end(); ++it)
00171                 {
00172                         createSceneTree(id, (*it));
00173                 }
00174         }
00175 }
